name: thundera-event-register-module
description: A Node module to register events created on Resolve applications

scripts.start: lein npm install; npm run watch
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run release; git commit -a -m 'Build release/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run release; git commit -a -m 'Build release/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run release; git commit -a -m 'Build release/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public

author: Andre Loureiro
